products.title: Splash Scarlet Red Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash scarlet red panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.
